Title: Verify login with valid credentials
Precondition: User is on the login page
Description: Enter valid username and password and verify successful login.

Title: Verify login with invalid credentials
Precondition: User is on the login page
Description: Enter invalid username and password and verify error message.

Title: Verify registration with valid data
Precondition: User is on the registration page
Description: Enter valid data and verify successful registration.

Title: Verify registration with invalid data
Precondition: User is on the registration page
Description: Enter invalid data and verify error message.

Title: Verify search functionality returns correct results
Precondition: User is on the product search page
Description: Enter search query and verify correct products are displayed.

Title: Verify search functionality handles empty query
Precondition: User is on the product search page
Description: Leave search query empty and verify appropriate message is displayed.

Title: Verify currency conversion accuracy for USD to EUR
Precondition: User is on the currency conversion page
Description: Enter USD amount and verify accurate conversion to EUR.

Title: Verify currency conversion accuracy for EUR to USD
Precondition: User is on the currency conversion page
Description: Enter EUR amount and verify accurate conversion to USD.

Title: Verify product details are displayed correctly
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: View product details and verify all information is displayed correctly.

Title: Verify product details page handles invalid product ID
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: Enter invalid product ID and verify appropriate message is displayed.

Title: Verify product reviews are displayed correctly
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: View product reviews and verify they are displayed correctly.

Title: Verify product reviews are sorted by date
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: Check if product reviews are sorted by date in descending order.

Title: Verify product images are displayed correctly
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: Check if product images are displayed correctly and in high resolution.

Title: Verify product availability status is accurate
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: Check if product availability status is updated in real-time.

Title: Verify product price is displayed correctly
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: Check if product price is displayed accurately with correct currency format.

Title: Verify user can add product to cart
Precondition: User is on the product details page
Description: Attempt to add product to cart and verify success message is displayed.

Title: Verify user can remove product from cart
Precondition: User has items in the shopping cart
Description: Attempt to remove product from cart and verify success message is displayed.

Title: Verify user can proceed to checkout
Precondition: User has items in the shopping cart
Description: Attempt to proceed to checkout and verify correct redirection to checkout page.

Title: Verify user can apply discount code
Precondition: User is on the checkout page
Description: Enter valid discount code and verify discount is applied correctly.

Title: Verify user can complete purchase
Precondition: User is on the checkout page
Description: Enter valid payment details and verify successful purchase completion.
